mos_evaluation_description: <Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Please evaluate the quality of the speech sample.
<Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Could you please evaluate the quality of this speech sample?
<Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Give me an assessment of the quality of this speech sample.
mos_evaluation_onlyscore: <Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Please evaluate the quality of the speech sample and only answer me with a score.
<Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Could you please show me a score of the quality of this speech sample?
<Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Give me a score to summarize the quality of this speech sample.
mos_evaluation_onlyscore_nisqa: <Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Please evaluate the quality of the speech sample and only answer me with a score according to NISQA standards.
<Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Could you please show me a score of the quality of this speech sample in accordance with NISQA standards?
<Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Give me a score to summarize the quality of this speech sample based on NISQA standards.
mos_evaluation_onlyscore_somos: <Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Please evaluate the quality of the speech sample and only answer me with a score based on SOMOS standards.
<Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Could you please show me a score of the quality of this speech sample according to SOMOS standards?
<Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Give me a score to summarize the quality of this speech sample in accordance with SOMOS standards.
mos_evaluation_onlyscore_bvcc: <Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Please evaluate the quality of the speech sample and only answer me with a score in accordance with BVCC standards.
<Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Could you please show me a score of the quality of this speech sample based on BVCC standards?
<Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Give me a score to summarize the quality of this speech sample according to BVCC standards.
mos_ABtest: <Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Could you please indicate which speech sample has better quality?
<Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Can you determine which speech sample is superior in quality?
<Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Would you be able to let me know which speech sample sounds better?
<Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Please tell me which speech sample is of higher quality.
spk_evaluation_onlyscore: <Speech><SpeechHere></Speech> Please give a score of the speaker similarity of the voices in the audio.
